## Type-2 Diabetes Treatment Pathways
Following are the instruction to run the complete study. 

a) Load the libraries

library("OhdsiRTools")
library("SqlRender")
library("DatabaseConnector")
library("CohortMethod")
library("gridExtra")
library("DiabetesTxPath")

b) Set up the connection details.
jdbcDrivers <- new.env()
connectionDetails <- createConnectionDetails(dbms = "postgresql", server = "userServer",user = "yourUser", password = "yourPassword",port = "yourPort")
